data.title: ESPERA-WERKE GMBH
data.meta_description:
ESPERA-WERKE GMBH | 2.532 Follower:innen auf LinkedIn. One step ahead.
Automatic weighing, labeling and inspection technology for fresh food industry. | ESPERA is a leading manufacturer of solutions for weighing, labelling and inspection technology. It´s field of application is in the industry sector, with the major focus in food industry. The product portfolio includes manual and automatic weigh-price labelling machines, checkweighing solutions, inspection solutions and full machine software integrations.
data.text:
ESPERA is a leading manufacturer of solutions for weighing, labelling and inspection technology. It´s field of application is in the industry sector, with the major focus in food industry. The product portfolio includes manual and automatic weigh-price labelling machines, checkweighing solutions, inspection solutions and full machine software integrations. For more than 90 years ESPERA is setting trends in the field of weighing, labeling and inspection with a market leading position. The headquater is located in Duisburg/ Germany and since 3 generations the family owned company is globally present with its subsidiaries and distribution partners.

Website

http://www.espera.com
